reviews.text: No light pass through this beer. It has a very thin white head. Medium carbonation. Chocolate, caramel, light vanilla and coffee in aroma and flavor. It is definitively a very decent doppelbock with extra aroma and flavor because of the American oak where it matured.
Hazy orange, complex fruity and malty flavor and aroma, very smooth. Can taste target, fuggles and Golding hops. Great beer, more like a cognac than Golden Pride. Will try it again, definitively.

I bought this beer because it has some awards, Chilean, latinoamerican and Australian. A disappointment, it doesnât have body, aroma and flavor is vegetables like a soy sauce and vegetables cooked in a wok with some roasted malt. A very weird beer.
